summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of Greenwood Ave. N. from N. 84th St. to N. 87th St.; by constructing and/or reconstructing decorative sidewalks, concrete curbs and gutters, mid-block crosswalk, intersection crosswalk, trees and gratings, decorative street lighting, electrical pole relocation, and pedestrian amenities (including street fixtures and furniture); also, Greenwood Ave. N. from N. 87th St. to N. 90th St; by constructing and/or reconstructing decorative sidewalks and concrete curbs, trees and gratings, lighting improvements, electrical pole relocation, and street fixtures and furnitures; also, N. 85th St. from Dayton ave. N. to 1st Ave. N.W.; by constructing and/or reconstructing sidewalks and curbs, trees and gratings, and lighting improvements; and by providing for the necessary surface drainage and acquisition of any necessary right-of-way and doing such other work as may be necessary in connection therewith; all in accordance with Resolution 25705 and Resolution 26110 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in siad district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds"; and superseding Ordinance 107235.
